about_the_game:
Wanting to create a modern urban environment, especially one that takes place in Japan? Then don’t miss out of this “Modern Japanese Interiors” pack!

This is a package of highly detailed pixel art map chip materials to help satiate most if not all of your urban needs! Also included are convenience stores, private homes, and train stations! The author carefully concentrated many complicated elements of urban Japanese buildings into pixel art form, without ending up with something feeling smudged or overly crowded!

The wall tiles of this pack are especially unique as it is possible to create a map that feels like three-dimensional with them. Also, the pack also contains wall tiles compatible with RPG Maker’s auto-wall feature, making it user-friendly to all RPG Maker users!

A sample map of an empty room is also provided in this package. You can easily create a room by placing objects as you see fit!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Tilesets (8 sheets)

A2 tiles: 1 sheet
A4 tiles: 1 sheet
A5 tiles: 2 sheets
B to E tiles: 4 sheets


Object character chips (4 sheets)

Door 48x96pixel(20 patterns)
Automatic ticket checker 48x96pixel(3 patterns)
Toilet 48x96pixel(3 patterns)

Includes project data with sample maps for RPG Maker MZ.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
